name: (Gamejam) Garden of Statues
description:
ARE GAMES ART? Everyone knows the answer to this question is MAYBE, but here I want to ask you IS THIS ART A GAME? 

This is a walking simulator through a peaceful statue garden. You can:
* Look at the statues (can you see everything?)
* Appreciate the statues
* Think about what the statues mean
* Pick up a rock
* Drop a rock
* Think about what the rock means
* Try not to annoy the garden's caretaker
* Crouch (why would you though?)

Made in 48 hours for Alakajam

https://www.alakajam.com/2nd-alakajam/137/garden-of-statues/

CONTROLS:

Default controls are WASD and Ctrl. Any other needed controls are explained ingame

Tools used: 

* Aseprite

* Blender

* Audacity

* Unity

* Renoise

* Gimp

Statue bodies created with UniHuman

UniHuman Character models used in this work.

UniHuman can be downloaded at "http://unihuman.yolasite.com/"
